definition: abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives

sentences.english: Inter-group cooperation is the engine of real progress at the grassroots.
sentences.chinese: 在基层民众中，组织内部的合作更是真正进步的动力。

sentences.english: The government rationed food to the public in wartime.
sentences.chinese: 在战争时期政府对民众实行食品定量供应。

sentences.english: The cable is classified secret and not for review by non-U. S. personnel.
sentences.chinese: 这份电文被标密，不允许非美国民众阅读。

sentences.english: The American public has yet to see the Zapruder film.
sentences.chinese: 美国民众还没有看到撒氏拍摄的影片。

sentences.english: But in general Americans are warier of government than of capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 然而，美国民众警惕政府，多于警惕资本主义。

sentences.english: His modesty certainly appealed to the public.
sentences.chinese: 他的谦逊无疑使民众倾心。

sentences.english: These regressive behaviors have already triggered strong indignation of the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 这些人的倒行逆施已经引起了中国民众的强烈愤慨。

sentences.english: On news of approaching enemy aircraft a gong sounded to warn the inhabitants.
sentences.chinese: 当敌人飞机来临时用敲锣的方式通知民众。

sentences.english: He roused the masses with his oratory .
sentences.chinese: 他以其雄辩术唤起民众。

sentences.english: Miaofeng Mountain is the religious belief of Beijing people.
sentences.chinese: 妙峰山是北京民众宗教信仰的中心。

sentences.english: "It will take time for that risk to be erased from the minds of the Korean public, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “让韩国民众消除恐惧心理是需要时间的”，他说道。

sentences.english: This crisis can be overcome only if resistance is carried out jointly by the people and the government.
sentences.chinese: 惟有实行民众和政府一致的抗战，才能挽救这个危局。

sentences.english: Quick question, I think people are curious to know what the city residence can benefit from this new campus.
sentences.chinese: 貌似大家都比较关心民众能从新园区中受益吗？

sentences.english: The intruders' tyrannical behavior led the local people to revolt.
sentences.chinese: 略者的残虐的行径，激起了当地民众的反抗。

sentences.english: And the multitudes hearing it, were in admiration at his doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 民众听了，就都惊讶他的道理。

sentences.english: Maitreya is a widely-believed bodhisattva in Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 弥勒佛被广大民众认为是中国文化中的菩萨。
